reviews.sentence: Lovely experience. Everything was just so good. We stayed in garden room with pool view. the room was spacious and very clean the bed so comfortable. We stayed 10 days and enjoyed every minute no complaints at all. The staff were very helpful and friendly.

Disappointing. Our last visit to Shangri La was wonderful from start to finish we received an upgraded suite and were treated like royalty. This time we did not expect another upgrade but the room we were allocated was far from perfect. There were renovations going on which is acceptable. but not if I have spent a lot on a luxury room with a view of the swimming pool and received a standard room with a view over rooftops. The charge for breakfast was taken off the bill as a result but all in all I will probably look for a different luxury hotel next time I am in Singapore it was not a great experience.

Our room was a little smaller than we expected and the bathtub made some loud noice when it was filled with water. We had an overall pleasant stay however. Great swimming pool. Convenient location. Nice and quiet neighbourhood. Courteous and helpful staffs. Children friendly. Will recommend and stay there again in the future.

Very disappointed with our room. we have spoken to management about this already but we had originally booked for 2 adults and 3 children. When we checked in our connecting rooms were only set up for 4 people. 4 towels no children sized robes no children sized slippers no kids amenities. And when we first spoke to the hotel about it Shangri La kept insisting that it was our travel agent who made the mistake. They sent me the correspondence. It definitely was not my travel agents fault. Other comments no newspapers in the morning check in took FOREVER and no introduction to kids facilities at all only realised there was an outdoor pirate ship as we were leaving the hotel. I found a crawling insect in my bathroom The clock in my kids room was not working Breakfast buffet on Saturday was a total nightmare. I was looking after 3 kids by myself and the waiter told me to go and get my own food. In the end they got me some water but it took almost 15 minutes. Then I decided to get breakfast in the room for the next two days and on check out was told that breakfast in the room was not included in my package. Really not very happy with Shang. On the plus sides location was great. Amazing play room. Some of the staff were very nice. Pool was nice and big.

The hotel does have some good staff. Hi must admit. this review would have been a lot lower if it were not for 2 staff the doorman assistant front of house manger the replied to my concerns. My experiences at the Shanghai La in Sydney have always been great but the hotel in Singapore was terrible. So why a 4 star “ Very good ” rating because of the final two touch points from the hotel were “ Very God”. Let me explain the doorman who was fetching our final taxi for us was the only person in the last two days that showed any empathy he apologised provided great service and made the whole family feel a little better thank you. The last touchpoint was from the response from a email complaint I followed up with citing all the issues. This email was also dealt with quickly and sincerely and I thank the duty manager for his response. This shows that the hotel management do want the right thing to happen just all the staff need to embrace the management direction every minute every day. The breakfast was the other highlightMy son is a young teenager and loves his food. The multicultural offerings blew his mind and his belt buckleAs expected the hotel facilities are great.

The hotel is good but there are some negative things. my Mastercard was initially not working there was a lot of pressure to pay. but as I am from a company which works frequently with you there should be other waysthe room was a little bit tired and not 100. cleanthe breakfast looks good for the 1st view. but finally there is no good bread jam or flakes.

Emailed property ahead asking for balcony room. No response. Asked twice whilst there told had to pay 50 60 per night. Which I eventually did on a 6 night stay. No good will offered came away feeling poor overall customer experience and unlikely to promote the hotel back to Shell. The staff though were superb.

Brilliant Stay. We have been visiting Singapore for several years and have stayed in various 5 star hotels. This time we stayed at the Shangri La for 7 days. Apart from the facilities which include a great pool gym lovely gardens marvellous breakfasts the highlight for us was the staff. The service was flawless on all fronts despite the fact that the hotel was packed during the National Day weekend. The staff have been well trained and have managed to achieve a balance between being professional and yet warm and friendly. They try their best to help. A special thank you to Amin the doorman for being so welcoming Alex and Jeb at the front desk Arif the ever helpful and knowledgeable concierge who managed to retrieve my husbands mobile phone which had been left behind in a taxi Siva Sharmah the Bell Captain Daniel Director FB and Chef Ayapa who prepared delicious food and served everyone with a smile despite the place being packedThere is no shortage of 5 star hotels in Singapore but what makes the Shangri La stand out is the caring attitude of their staff. We visit Singapore often and you have a loyal customer who is looking forward to staying with you again. thank you and well done.

This is a beautiful property with a friendly helpful staff. However my room was not very clean and the pullout sofa bed was made up taking too much space. I checked in very late and did not want to bother with calling for housekeeping staff so I fixed it myself so I could go to sleep. I then found a used cotton swab in the sheets. Also in general the incidental prices are unreasonably expensive. I consider myself to be financially comfortable but I know when mark up pricing is out of control. These prices are simply taking advantage of travelers. Breakfast buffet at over 70 USD and a soda beverage in the bar at 9 USD is not necessary. it is like saying Only the rich are welcomed here at the Shangri la Hotel.
We ordered a few dishes everything is ok except the curry chicken is quite bad. The curry chicken is the worst we ever eaten. Please get a taster to check out the curry chicken and improve it.
Excellent service by Paul Roy. Dinesh.

Stunning hotel. We have just returned home from a 4 night stay in the Valley Wing part of the hotel and all I can say is wow. The Shangri la is a beautiful hotel with exceptional staff who go out of their way to make you feel welcome. The Valley wing perks were incredible. We enjoyed afternoon tea delicious canapés every evening and a variety of drinks throughout the day. The gin trolley was our favourite. Our room was spacious and had a lovely view out to the gardens and the pool. They decorated it for me for my birthday and had a little cake for me. Breakfast was also amazing and there is a large variety to choose from all freshly prepared for you. Please explore the grounds as there is a large variety of Orchids growing around the gardens. I ca n’t wait to return.

Lovely Stay. The room was large comfortable and very clean. The staff were excellent. The pool area was very nice. The breakfast buffet was very good. I especially liked being able to sit outside for breakfast. I highly recommend this hotel.
Excellent stay. Staff delightful and most helpful.

I really enjoyed staying at the Shang Ri La hotel. The facilities are really good and the food is excellent. I ’ve had room service quite a lot and it has always been delicious. The food is hot and tasty. Also Jesie is a very nice lady. She delivered my food and was very nice and friendly. She explained about the dish and the advice was helpful. Also are the staff here are welcoming and nice. And also smile and say hi. I would definitely stay at the Shang Ri La hotel in Singapore again.

All I can say is Ww. Delicious food Awesome service. Especially mention to all this staff who make our lunch experience more enjoyoble Aoi Jodie Dinesh Adriano and The Chefs Jefrey and Jong. I will defenitely come again with my friends and family.
Fabulous hotel staff to match marvellous experience.
Kudos to staff member Aoi Andrea and Shoban for the great service. Very attentive staff and the food is fantastic.

Every time we come over the the Shangri La Valley wing in Singapore it Always a great experience of feeling welcomed taken care of. My rating is mainly motivated by your personel all of them from the room attendant up to the managers. Kind words and attention perfectly clean in the COVID 19 period it is important. So a great stay and the intention of coming back. If I had to make a negative remark I would say that the internal decoration of the room would need to be updated it has not changed for years.

Lovely. Friendly helpful and warm staff cleanliness and facilities at the hotel were up to standard or I should say better than expected. My kid had a great time playing at Buds and we love the food at The Line. Thanks too for pampering him with a warm welcome for his birthdayNothing all was fantastic.
